title: When Titans Roamed
description: Follow the adventure of Zeus and his siblings. Poseidon, Hades, Hestia, Hera, and Demeter as you discover how the Greek world came about, how the Titans came to be, the war which leads to their fall, and how the Greek Olympian gods rise as they defeat the mighty Titans and build their home a top Mount Olympus. This series of rhyme and great illustrations teaches the child in a fun and exciting way about the great myths making it fun and adventurous. The Gods and heroes are depicted as children themselves, allowing the reader to connect to the story as if it could even be them in the book
author: Errol Jud Coder
